fullText:
Divine Excellence [Divinity]

Prerequisite: Channel Divinity class feature, must worship a deity of the skill domain
Benefit: You gain the Channel Divinity power divine excellence.


Feat UtilityDivine Excellence

Your prayer inspires excellence in yourself and your allies.

Encounter      Divine
Free Action      Personal

Channel Divinity: You can use only one channel divinity power per encounter

Trigger: You make a skill check

Effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to the skill check. Until the end of your next turn, you and each ally within 10 squares of you gain a +2 power bonus to checks using the same skill.


Published in Divine Power, page(s) 118.
name: Divine Excellence
prerequisite: Channel Divinity class feature, must worship a deity of the skill domain
benefit: You gain the Channel Divinity power divine excellence.
